data.title: Women's World Cup: Norway team come up with brilliant response to critics of women's football
data.meta_description: We are awarding this video, put together by the Norway women's team, our brand new "Best Use Of Sarcasm" trophy
data.text:
Regardless of how good the current Women's World Cup turns out to be, there are plenty of football fans who will still insist the women's game is rubbish.

Nonsense, of course, mostly spouted by people who haven't watched a single minute of top level women's football.

Fortunately for female players everywhere, the Norwegian team have come up with the video you can see above - the most brilliant use of sarcasm we've seen in a very long time.

One by one, they take every lazy assumption made about the women's game and (very sarcastically) make it clear how daft/ridiculous/stupid the cliche is.

It's brilliant - and basically does this to all those people currently slagging off the standard of the World Cup:
